Package com.delgiudice.pokemonbattlefx.network

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientSyncThread
    Clientside thread that swaps information about the game state to confirm the games are in sync.
    ClientThread
    Handles connecting to the server as well as maintaining connection.
    MoveSync
    Thread that initiates information swap between players about the move they are about to take
    NetworkThread
    Base class of threads that handle network connection during multiplayer games.
    ServerSyncThread
    Serverside thread that swaps information about the game state to confirm the games are in sync.
    ServerThread
    Handles connecting to the client.
    SwitchDataReceive
    Thread that handles receiving data about the next Pokémon sent out by the online enemy.
    SwitchDataSend
    Thread that handles sending data about the next Pokémon sent out by the player.
    SyncThread
    Base class of a thread for comparing game state and waiting - checks if game state is identical between both players.
